amendment.description: To authorize the settlement of claim of the Oakland Base Reuse Authority and Redevelopment Agency of the City of Oakland, California.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3340 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3340 proposed by Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S6717; text: CR S6717) To authorize the settlement of claim of the Oakland Base Reuse Authority and Redevelopment Agency of the City of Oakland, California.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3340 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3340 proposed by Senator Levin.
